I am a forester/UAS remote pilot/remote sensing scientist living in Corvallis, OR. 
I study as a PhD student at Oregon State University and receive funding as a graduate teaching/reasearch assistant. 
I am an associate of the Aerial Information Systems lab directed by my advisor, Michael Wing.
Additionally, I am an ORISE research participant, collaborating with the USFS PNW research facility. 
Current passions include: trees, drones, GIS, statistics, coding, and surfing.
